result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Damon Leon Kruse

records.addlTxt: Deferred Acceptance of Guilty Plea agreement

No abusive contact with RJB. No use or possession of dangerous weapons, including brass knuckles. Not to possess or consume alcohol. Subject to testing to determine compliance upon reasonable suspicion.

CASES: 22CF208 & 22CM72. 11:57 AM Defendant Damon Leon Kruse in court.  Attorney Derek W Sanders in court for Damon Leon Kruse.  Attorney Benjamin James Webster in court for State of Wisconsin. CW-clerk. 
22CF208-Count 1-guilty plea. CT does NOT accept plea at this time, 24 mo deferred agreement filed with the court. $150 to be paid to the DA office. 4 days credit. CT sets new bond. 
Count 2-DRI

22CM72-Count 1-obstructing-guilty plea. CT accepts plea, adj guilty & judgment entered. 
Count 2-D/C-guilty plea. CT accepts plea, adj guilty & judgment entered. 

SENTENCE: 
22CM72-
Count 1-obstructing-w/h probation, 2yrs, AODA, AS, no controlled substances. No abusive contact w/ RJB. No abusive contact with DNFS. No use of brass knuckles or firearms. Follow conditions/programming/rules per agent. Must follow rules of supervision. Restitution to be determined. Must report to probation today. DNA sample, $200 surcharge, $265.60 fine. 60 dtp or set pp, ftp-judgment. Elig for expungement if successfully completes DGAP & probation, fines/costs paid in full. 

Count 2-D/C-w/h probation, 2yrs, AODA, AS, no controlled substances. NC w/ RJB. No abusive contact with DNFS. No use of brass knuckles or firearms. Follow conditions/programming/rules per agent. Must follow rules of supervision. Restitution to be determined. Must report to probation today. DNA sample, $200 surcharge, $265.60 fine. 60 dtp or set pp, ftp-judgment. Elig for expungement if successfully completes DGAP & probation, fines/costs paid in full. 

PCR. 12:28 pm adj.

Sanders-requesting cases be set for plea/sentencing. Bonds cont. 11:16 am adj.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 10, 2022 at 11:45 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing on October 10, 2022 at 11:45 am.

CASES 22CF208 (AIA) and 22CM72 (Prelim). 9:01 AM. Prosecuting attorney Holly D. Wood Webster in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Damon Leon Kruse in court.  Attorney Derek W Sanders in court for Damon Leon Kruse. 
22CM72 (AIA) - Reading waived, plea NG. 
22CF208 (Prelim & ARGN) - State calls officer Reed - S&T. Cross by Atty Sanders. CT finds identification is made. CT finds PC, def bound over for trial. Reading waived. Plea NG. Defense is preserved 15 days on prearraignment rights. Bond cont. 9:10 am adj.
Status conference scheduled for August 29, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Status conference on August 29, 2022 at 11:00 am.
